meanings.sent1: Her impulsiveness decision to buy the expensive purse surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: His impulsiveness behavior often led to unexpected outcomes.
meanings.sent3: The impulsiveness puppy chased after the butterfly without thinking about the consequences.
meanings.sent4: The impulsiveness nature of the storm caught everyone off guard.

meanings.definition: The tendency to act on sudden urges or desires
meanings.sent1: His impulsiveness often got him into trouble with his impulsive decisions.
meanings.sent2: The impulsiveness of the child made it challenging for the parents to predict his actions.
meanings.sent3: The impulsiveness of the squirrel to gather nuts amused the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: Her impulsiveness was like a wild horse, impossible to control.
meanings.sent5: The impulsiveness of the waves crashing against the shore was mesmerizing.
